SEARCH
Package util.helpers

Class InputHelper

Object
InputHelper
public class InputHelper extends Object
A class that provides static functions to help get certain inputs from users that are dependent on validity provided by systems. An example is getting a valid campId from user. Depends on Input class to get the actual input, and runs validity check using the system provided.
Since:
21-11-2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sim Yi Wan Terence

  • Method Details

    • getCampIdFromUser

      public static int getCampIdFromUser(Input input, CampSystem campSystem, String action)
      Get camp id from user input. User will be asked to enter ID to action.
      Parameters:
      input - input object
      campSystem - campsystem object
      action - string describing what user would do with id
      Returns:
      valid campId

    • getEnquiryIdFromUser

      Get enquiry id from user input. User will be asked to enter ID to action.
      Parameters:
      input - input object
      feedbackSystem - feedbackSystem object
      action - string describing what user would do with id
      campId - camp that enquiry belongs to
      Returns:
      valid enquiryId

      public static int getBoundedInt(Input input, int min, int max, String msg)
